title: How to Disable Group Messaging on an iPhone

steps.title: Open your iPhone's Settings .
steps.content: Open your iPhone's Settings . The icon looks like a set of grey gears and is located on the home screen. If you don't see it there, it'll be in a folder called "Utilities" in your App Library.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Messages.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Messages . It is in the fifth group of options of the menu.

steps.title: Toggle the "Group Messaging" switch to Off .
steps.content: Toggle the "Group Messaging" switch to Off . You'll find this switch in the "SMS/MMS" section. When you turn this feature off, you will no longer be able to participate in group texting conversations.
